title: Bilingual Children: Two Languages, One Brain
description: A 60-second lesson on Bilingual Children: Two Languages, One Brain.

hook.text: People once feared bilingualism confused children. Research shows it actually enhances their cognitive abilities.

buildup.text: Bilingual children's brains constantly manage two language systems, strengthening executive function.

discovery.text: They show better attention control, cognitive flexibility, and problem-solving than monolingual peers.

punchline.text: Two languages don't confuse the brain. They strengthen it for life.
